newsletterSignUp.campaign.title: Marketing Campaign For Lead
newsletterSignUp.campaign.description: Select the marketing campaign you want to use to track leads when a user subscribes to the newsletter.

newsletterSignUp.genericFirstName.title: Default First Name
newsletterSignUp.genericFirstName.description:
Enter the default text to display in the First Name field of the Lead record if a first name is not supplied by the user.
The placeholder [[email]] is automatically replaced by the user's email address. For example, you can send a personalized marketing email generated from the Lead record saying "Welcome user@email.com!" if a name is not known.

newsletterSignUp.genericLastName.title: Default Last Name
newsletterSignUp.genericLastName.description:
Enter the default text to display in the Last Name field of the Lead record if a first name is not supplied by the user.
The placeholder [[email]] is automatically replaced by the user's email address. For example, you can send a personalized marketing email generated from the Lead record saying "Welcome user@email.com!" if a name is not known.

newsletterSignUp.createCompanyLeads.title: Create Lead As Company
newsletterSignUp.createCompanyLeads.description: Check this box to create newsletter sign-up leads as companies, rather than individuals. This setting applies to newsletter-sign up only.

newsletterSignUp.leadSubsidiary.title: Associate Lead To
newsletterSignUp.leadSubsidiary.description: Select the subsidiary with which you want the lead to be associated.

newsletterSignUp.companyName.title: Default Company Name
newsletterSignUp.companyName.description:
Enter the default text to display in the Company field of the Lead record if a first name is not supplied by the user.
The placeholder [[email]] is automatically replaced by the user's email address. For example, you can send a personalized marketing email generated from the Lead record saying "Welcome user@email.com!" if a company is not known.
